title: How to Make Wheel in Little Alchemy: Quick Recipe Guide

steps.title: Combine Tool and Wood to make Wheel.
steps.content: Combine Tool and Wood to make Wheel. You'll need to combine a few of the base elements beforehand. [1] X Research source Here's the fastest way to create Wheel: Water + Earth = Mud Water + Air = Rain Earth + Rain = Plant Mud + Plant = Swamp Air + Fire = Energy Swamp + Energy = Life Earth + Life = Human Earth + Fire = Lava Air + Lava = Stone Fire + Stone = Metal Human + Metal = Tool Stone + Air = Sand Fire + Sand = Glass Sand + Glass = Time Plant + Time = Tree Tool + Tree = Wood Tool + Wood = Wheel

steps.title: Combine Tool and Water to make Wheel.
steps.content: Combine Tool and Water to make Wheel. You can also combine River or Stream with Tool. Alternatively, combine Motion with Tool, Metal, Stone, or Wheel to create Wheel. If you're starting from the beginning, here's the fastest way to make Wheel: With Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Primordial soup + Time = Life Clay + Life = Human Human + Stone = Tool Tool + Water = Wheel Without Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial soup + Energy = Life Clay + Life = Human Human + Stone = Tool Tool + Water = Wheel

steps.title: The Wheel can be used to create other elements.
steps.content: The Wheel can be used to create other elements. The recipes will vary slightly between Little Alchemy 1 and 2. Be sure to use the recipes for the version you're using. Little Alchemy 1 : Wheel + Wheel + Bicycle Wheel + Metal = Car Wheel + Wood = Cart Wheel + Time = Clock Wheel + Mouse = Hamster Wheel + Clay = Pottery Wheel + Snowboard = Skateboard Wheel + Boiler = Steam engine Wheel + Wool = Thread Wheel + Steam Engine = Train Wheel + Water/River = Waterwheel Wheel + Wind = Windmill Little Alchemy 2 : Wheel + Wheel/Chain/Machine = Bicycle Wheel + Metal/Steel/Bicycle/Motorcycle = Car Wheel + Wood = Cart Wheel + Time/Sundial = Clock Wheel + Petroleum = Combustion engine Wheel + Human = Cyclist Wheel + Dough/Cookie dough = Donut Wheel + Thread = Fabric Wheel + Wheat = Flour Wheel + Mouse/Rat = Hamster Wheel + Tool/Boiler = Machine Wheel + Sunflower = Oil Wheel + Cheese = Pizza Wheel + Clay = Pottery Wheel + Snowboard/Skier/Ski goggles = Skateboard Wheel + Steam/Boiler = Steam engine Wheel + Sun/Light/Day = Sundial Wheel + Cotton = Thread Wheel + Steam engine = Train Wheel + Wind/Wall = Windmill
